{{Infobox Key Item |name = Dungeon Ticket |image = [[File:Dungeonticket.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Dungeon Ticket''. |use = Allows entry to [[Dungeons|dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} |obtain = Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] for 100 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} }} ===Description=== This ticket grants access to all [[Dungeons]] in the [[Kanto]] region.
Tip: You gain [[Dungeon Tokens]] by re-capturing Pok√©mon. ===Acquisition=== Can be purchased at the [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Viridian City Shop]] ===Effects=== You can enter [[Dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
